mapper.sql: select r.id, r.user_id, r.user_name, r.report_type, r.work_content, r.completed_tasks, r.next_plan, r.problems, r.submit_time, r.update_time from reports r
mapper.insert: insert into reports(user_id, user_name, report_type, work_content, completed_tasks, next_plan, problems, submit_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{reportType}, #{workContent}, #{completedTasks}, #{nextPlan}, #{problems}, #{submitTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE reports
work_content = #{workContent},
completed_tasks = #{completedTasks},
next_plan = #{nextPlan},
problems = #{problems},
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.description, t.status, t.assignee_id as assigneeId, t.project_id as projectId, t.created_time as createdTime, t.update_time as updateTime, p.name as projectName FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN projects p ON t.project_id = p.id WHERE t.assignee_id = #{userId} AND t.status = 'COMPLETED' AND t.update_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY t.update_time DESC
